PricingCompanyHelpBlog

Undoubtedly the best business card

Free plastic and virtual cards for freelancers and SMEs packed up with next-level expense management solution

  • German IBAN account opened in 48 hours
  • Free VISA debit cards with 0% commission and up to 3% cashback
  • Free employee cards with spending control features
  • Team expenses ready for accounting with receipts collected online
  • Plastic or virtual prepaid cards

ATM withdrawal limit
of 2000€ per month

FINOM Virtual Card —
quick, flexible, secure

Pay on the go

Forget about the hassle of physical cards and pay with just your smart phone using Apple Pay or Google Pay

Feel secure

No magnetic strips, visible card numbers or PINs. No risk of overspending above prepaid limits

Issue instanly

Several clicks to create a card for any purpose and every employee

Manage in real-time

Set limits, freeze, track, top-up or block cards in just a minute from mobile or desktop

about us

Olivier Binet
Head of business in France
20 years of experience in E-Commerce and FinTech, focusing on business development and innovation. Conducts independent coaching for startups development. Lives in Paris, France.

We are a team of successful, modern, serial entrepreneurs with vast experience in creating IT solutions. We entered banking to become technological challengers.

Co-founder
4 years in fintech. 13 years in HR, 3 years in Marketing. Сonducts independent coaching with European ECF certification. Lives in Amsterdam, the Netherlands.

That’s why we’ve set up FINOM – a digital solution that helps you create, send and store invoices and electronic invoices. We wanted to build a place where you can grow your business and make money but not waste your time.
